org.apache.hadoop.hbase.http

类 TestSpnegoHttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.http.HttpServerFunctionalTest
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.http.TestSpnegoHttpServer

  • public class TestSpnegoHttpServer
extends HttpServerFunctionalTest
    Test class for SPNEGO authentication on the HttpServer. Uses Kerby's MiniKDC and Apache HttpComponents to verify that a simple Servlet is reachable via SPNEGO and unreachable w/o.
